original_text: Its thickness was a handbreadth. And its brim was made like the brim of a cup, like the flower of a lily. It held 3,000 baths.
korean_text: 바다의 두께는 한 손 너비만 하고 그 둘레는 잔 둘레와 같이 백합화의 모양으로 만들었으니 그 바다에는 삼천 밧을 담겠으며

sentences.original_text: And its brim was made like the brim of a cup
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것의 가장자리는 잔의 가장자리처럼 만들어졌다.

sentences.original_text: like the flower of a lily.
